alert.note: Alert for Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 07 at 3:43PM EST until November 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TUESDAY TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the Bay and lower Neuse River and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from 1 AM Tuesday to 7 PM EST Wednesday. For the High Surf Advisory, from 4 PM Tuesday to 1 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Up to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in some areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in an elevated threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest impacts will be around the time of high tide which will be around 8 AM Tuesday and Wednesday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
